text: Be My Girl may refer to: * Be My Girl (Jim Dale song), 1957: written by Artie Singer; produced by George Martin; with instrumental accompaniment and directed by Ron Goodwin * "Be My Girl" (The Dramatics song), 1976 * Be My Girl (The Police song)|"Be My Girl" (The Police song), 1980 * "Be My Girl" (New Kids on the Block song), 1986 * "Be My Girl" (Eamon song), 2017
title: Be My Girl
